body: @hilldog that's because the manga is basically a compilation of bad ending routes, the canon ending in the game is actually an happy ending =)
that's why I love it, and hop all is in English soon

Oooooooooh shit.  It's TinkerBell.  My soul is not ready.  Prepare for nipple-fucking, bug-laying, uterus-stretching and a terrible, horrible, depression-fueled ending.  DO NOT be fooled by the innocuous/innocent start.  TinkerBell doujins only end one way, with a girl giving birth to bugs out of her breasts, pussy, and asshole, completely mindbroken.  They will not be saved.  There is no hope.  Abandon all hope ye who enter this doujin!

Then again, if you like that kind of thing, continue on!
